Title: How to Find Sponsorship Opportunities

Description: Find sponsorships by building a media kit with audience demographics, identifying brands that sponsor similar creators, and pitching via personalized cold email. Even micro-influencers (1K+ followers) can land $500â€“5,000 deals.
